title: Mac League not working
body: I keep getting a thing i cant remeber the exact works but this is what it says "NoOriannaBall" not found when you click ok a support guide will come up (it didnt) please re install your league. I try to go on league and then it says corrupted files repair i repaiir them and the same thing keeps happening:(

replies.body:
Have you tried completely uninstalling, restarting your computer, and reinstalling League?

If it happens again, could you grab a screenshot of the exact error and upload it here as an attachment?
